verses.verse: And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in, and <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may hold a <S%H2287>feast<s%> to me in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I should <S%H8085>obey<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> to let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go?<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> will I let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> has <S%H7122>met<s%> with us: let us <S%H3212>go,<s%> we <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H7969>three<s%> days' <S%H3117><s%><S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>desert,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H6293>fall<s%> on us with <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>Why<s%> do you, <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H6544>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> from their <S%H4639>works?<s%> <S%H3212>get<s%> you to your <S%H5450>burdens.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> are <S%H7227>many,<s%> and you make them <S%H7673>rest<s%> from their <S%H5450>burdens.<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

You shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> to make <S%H3835>brick,<s%> as <S%H8543>heretofore:<s%> let them <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7197>gather<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> for <S%H1992>themselves.<s%>

And the <S%H4971>tale<s%> of the <S%H3843>bricks,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they did <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H8543>heretofore,<s%> you shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> on them; you shall not <S%H1639>diminish<s%> ought thereof: for they be <S%H7504>idle;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H6817>cry,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to our <S%H430>God.<s%>
Let there more <S%H5656>work<s%> be <S%H3515>laid<s%> on the <S%H582>men,<s%> that they may <S%H6213>labor<s%> therein; and let them not <S%H8159>regard<s%> <S%H8267>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words.<s%>

And the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, and their <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and they <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> you, <S%H3947>get<s%> you <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you can <S%H4672>find<s%> it: <S%H3588>yet<s%> not <S%H1697>ought<s%> of your <S%H5656>work<s%> shall be <S%H1639>diminished.<s%>

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6327>scattered<s%> <S%H6527>abroad<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H7197>gather<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%> instead of <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

And the <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> <S%H213>hurried<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3615>Fulfill<s%> your <S%H4639>works,<s%> your <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>tasks,<s%> as <S%H834>when<s%> there was <S%H8401>straw.<s%>

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5065>taskmasters<s%> had <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, were <S%H5221>beaten,<s%> and <S%H559>demanded,<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> have you not <S%H3615>fulfilled<s%> your <S%H2706>task<s%> in making <S%H3835>brick<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H8543>yesterday<s%> and to <S%H3117>day,<s%> as <S%H8543>heretofore?<s%>

Then the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> you <S%H3541>thus<s%> with your <S%H5650>servants?<s%>

There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and they <S%H559>say<s%> to us, <S%H6213>Make<s%> <S%H3843>brick:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H5221>beaten;<s%> but the <S%H2398>fault<s%> is in your own <S%H5971>people.<s%>

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> You are <S%H7503>idle,<s%> you are <S%H7503>idle:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> you <S%H559>say,<s%> Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> and do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> and <S%H5647>work;<s%> for there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> you, yet shall you <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H8506>tale<s%> of <S%H3843>bricks.<s%>

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H7200>see<s%> that they were in <S%H7451>evil<s%> case, after it was <S%H559>said,<s%> You shall not <S%H1639>minish<s%> ought from your <S%H3843>bricks<s%> of your <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>task.<s%>
And they <S%H6293>met<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> who <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H7125>way,<s%> as they <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to them, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> on you, and <S%H8199>judge;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> you have made our <S%H7381>smell<s%> to be <S%H887>abhorred<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> to <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> us.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> have you so <S%H7489>evil<s%> entreated <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people?<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> is it that you have <S%H7971>sent<s%> me?

For <S%H4480>since<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> in your <S%H8034>name,<s%> he has done <S%H7489>evil<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have you <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> at <S%H3605>all.<s%>
